lg.l: Æ²Ouchsafe Religious Lady to make choyce
That your poore Suppliant justly may Reioyce
In the fore-front of his Apologie:
To frustrate All objections by this shift,
An humble heart A'cepts the meanest guist.
May you Accuse mee of Presumption; no
J have accus'd my Selfe: And you I know
To pardon faults Confest are easily wonne:
Let Zoylus snarle, let Momus looke asquint,
Your worth will guard the Booke, And, MARKE PRAYER IN'Y.
